name: Zebra Assistant Bot
description: This is an official Zebra Assistant Bot. Please do not change the behavior of this bot. If you face any issues, please contact developer of the bot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot Token of the bot provided by Telegram

ADMINS_LIST.description: List of ids of admins of the bot separated by comma

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Telegram ID or Telegram group ID, required to send logs to telegram group

YT_CHANNEL_ID.description: Channel ID of your Youtube Channel

WEBSITE_URL.description: Website URL from where you want to fetch future events
